00002 /*! clear vector */
00003 inline void drovector::clear()
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] drovector::clear()"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   std::cerr << "# [NOTE] drovector::clear() "
00012             << " An array at " << Array
00013             << " is going to be cleared." << std::endl;
00014 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00015 
00016   L =0;
00017   delete [] Array;
00018   Array =NULL;
00019 }

00021 //=============================================================================
00022 /*! make vector into zero vector */
00023 inline void drovector::zero()
00024 {
00025 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00026   std::cerr << "# [MARK] drovector::zero()"
00027             << std::endl;
00028 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00029   
00030   for(long i=0; i<L; i++){ Array[i] =0.0; }
00031 }

00033 //=============================================================================
00034 /*! change sign(+/-) of the vector */
00035 inline void drovector::chsign()
00036 {
00037 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00038   std::cerr << "# [MARK] drovector::chsign()"
00039             << std::endl;
00040 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00041   
00042   for(long i=0; i<L; i++){ Array[i] =-Array[i]; }
00043 }

00045 //=============================================================================
00046 /*! make a deep copy of the drovector */
00047 inline void drovector::copy(const drovector& vec)
00048 {
00049 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00050   std::cerr << "# [MARK] drovector::copy(const drovector&)"
00051             << std::endl;
00052 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00053   
00054 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00055   std::cerr << "# [NOTE] drovector::copy(const drovector&) "
00056             << "A drovector at " << Array << " is going to be deleted. ";
00057 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00058   
00059   delete [] Array;
00060   L =vec.L;
00061   Array =new double[vec.L];
00062   dcopy_(vec.L, vec.Array, 1, Array, 1);
00063   
00064 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00065   std::cerr << "Then, a COPY of a drovector has been cleated at "
00066             << Array << "." << std::endl;
00067 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00068 }

00071 /*! make a shallow copy of the vector\n
00072  This function is not desinged to be used in project codes. */
00073 inline void drovector::shallow_copy(const _drovector& vec)
00074 {
00075 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00076   std::cerr << "# [MARK] drovector::shallow_copy(const _drovector&)"
00077             << std::endl;
00078 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00079   
00080 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00081   std::cerr << "# [NOTE] drovector::shallow_copy(const _drovector&) "
00082             << "A drovector at " << Array << " is going to be deleted "
00083             << "and point at " << vec.Array << " instead." << std::endl;
00084 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00085   
00086   delete [] Array;
00087   L =vec.L;
00088   Array =vec.Array;
00089 }

00091 //=============================================================================
00092 /*! resize vector */
00093 inline void drovector::resize(const long& _l)
00094 {
00095 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00096   std::cerr << "# [MARK] drovector::resize(const long&)"
00097             << std::endl;
00098 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00099   
00100 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00101   if( _l<0 ){
00102     std::cerr << "[ERROR] drovector::resize(const long&)" << std::endl
00103               << "Vector size must be positive integers." << std::endl
00104               << "Your input was (" << _l << ")." << std::endl;
00105     exit(1);
00106   }
00107 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00108   
00109   L =_l;
00110   delete [] Array;
00111   Array =new double[_l];
00112 }

00114 //=============================================================================
00115 /*! swap two vectors */
00116 inline void swap(drovector& u, drovector& v)
00117 {
00118 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00119   std::cerr << "# [MARK] swap(drovector&, drovector&)"
00120             << std::endl;
00121 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00122   
00123   long u_L(u.L);
00124   double* u_Array(u.Array);
00125   u.L=v.L; u.Array=v.Array;
00126   v.L=u_L; v.Array=u_Array;
00127 }

00129 //=============================================================================
00130 /*! convert user object to smart-temporary object */
00131 inline _drovector _(drovector& vec)
00132 {
00133 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00134   std::cerr << "# [MARK] _(drovector&)"
00135             << std::endl;
00136 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00137 
00138   _drovector newvec;
00139 
00140   newvec.L =vec.L;
00141   newvec.Array =vec.Array;
00142   
00143   vec.L =0;
00144   vec.Array =NULL;
00145   
00146   return newvec;
00147 }
